changeSet.createView: select q1.INSTANCE_ID, q1.PROCESS_KIND, q1.PARENT_INSTANCE_ID, prj.PROJECT_ID, prj.PROJECT_NAME, prj.ORG_ID, prj.ORG_NAME, q1.CREATED_AT, q1.INITIATOR, q1.CURRENT_STATUS, q1.LAST_AGENT_ID, q1.LAST_UPDATED_AT, q1.PROCESS_TAGS, array(select q2.INSTANCE_ID from PROCESS_QUEUE as q2 where q2.PARENT_INSTANCE_ID = q1.INSTANCE_ID) as CHILDREN_IDS from PROCESS_QUEUE as q1 left join (select PROJECT_ID, PROJECT_NAME, ORG_ID, (select ORG_NAME from ORGANIZATIONS where ORGANIZATIONS.ORG_ID = PROJECTS.ORG_ID) from PROJECTS) prj on prj.PROJECT_ID = q1.PROJECT_ID
